entry.title: Password Generator
entry.content:
Password Generator

A small passphrase generator written in C, inspired by this article on passphrases.

About

A lightweight tool that generates secure, memorable passphrases using the Diceware approach — passphrases you can memorize but attackers can’t guess.

Links

  • GitHub Repository
entry.summary: A tiny passphrase generator based on the Diceware method, written in C.
